alert.note: Alert for Luquillo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 08 at 8:48AM AST until November 08 at 11:00AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Luquillo County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1100 AM AST. * At 848 AM AST, emergency management reported flash floods affecting roads PR-984 in Bo Savannah near Alejandrina Rios Benabe School, PR-193 near Rafael N Coca School, and PR-940 near Puente de las Abejas and Hacienda Margarita. Additionally, a mudslide is affecting road PR-984 in Bo Juan Martin. These roads are impassable. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fajardo, Luquillo, Ramos, Playa Fortuna and Palmer. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
